hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ur.rolename,ur.roleid FROM USERROLEVW ur INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid=:pdid AND psd.psdcode = 'Z') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (psd.psdid=ppd.psdid AND ppd.roleid = ur.roleid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid
SELECT R.ROLENAME, PPD.ROLEID FROM IG222 PPD LEFT JOIN IG333 PSD ON PSD.PSDID = PPD.PSDID LEFT JOIN ROLE R ON R.ROLEID = PPD.ROLEID WHERE PSD.PDID = :pdid AND PSD.PSDCODE = 'Z'

SELECT pd.pdid,pd.ptid, pd.pdname,pd.pddesc,pd.pdcrtdate,pd.pdstatus, '' as pdxml,pd.fingerprint, pd.permission,pd.serialgenerator,pd.pdactname,'' as reportdesc,pd.messagegenerator,pd.pdservicecatalog,pd.pdserialnumber,pd.pdservicecatalogname FROM IG380 pd INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (pd.pdid=psd.pdid AND psd.psdcode = 'Z') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (psd.psdid=ppd.psdid) INNER JOIN USERROLE ur on (ppd.roleid = ur.roleid AND ur.userid = :userid ) INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(PDID) AS pdid FROM IG380 WHERE PTID = 8 and pdstatus = :pdstatus GROUP BY SUBSTR(PDID,1,5)) a ON (a.pdid = pd.pdid) WHERE pd.ptid = 8 and pd.pdstatus = :pdstatus

SELECT DISTINCT pd.pdid,pd.ptid,pd.pdname,pd.pddesc,pd.pdcrtdate,pd.pdstatus,'' as pdxml,pd.fingerprint, pd.permission,pd.serialgenerator,pd.pdactname,'' as reportdesc,pd.messagegenerator,pdservicecatalog,pdserialnumber,pdservicecatalogname FROM IG380 pd INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (pd.pdid=psd.pdid AND psd.psdcode = 'Z') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (psd.psdid=ppd.psdid) INNER JOIN USERROLE ur on (ppd.roleid = ur.roleid) INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(PDID) AS pdid FROM IG380 WHERE PTID = 8 GROUP BY SUBSTR(PDID,1,5)) a ON (a.pdid = pd.pdid) WHERE pd.ptid = 8 and pd.pdstatus = 'a'

SELECT DISTINCT pd.pdid,pd.ptid,pd.pdname,pd.pddesc,pd.pdcrtdate,pd.pdstatus,'' as pdxml,pd.fingerprint, pd.permission,pd.serialgenerator,pd.pdactname,'' as reportdesc,pd.messagegenerator,pdservicecatalog,pdserialnumber,pdservicecatalogname FROM IG380 pd INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (pd.pdid=psd.pdid AND psd.psdcode = 'Z') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (psd.psdid=ppd.psdid) INNER JOIN USERROLE ur on (ppd.roleid = ur.roleid AND ur.userid = :userid ) WHERE pd.pdstatus = :pdstatus AND ptid = :ptid
select count(pg.pidid) from IG202 pg where pg.pidid not in (select pid.pidgid from IG007 pid where pid.pidgid is not null
select pg.* from IG202 pg where pg.pidid not in (select pid.pidgid from IG007 pid where pid.pidgid is not null
select pr.* ,pa.paid,(case when pa.pastatus is null then '0' else pa.pastatus end) as assessmentstatus from IG500 pr left join IG433 pa on prid = paprid where pr.prstatus = 'C'

SELECT a.pipdid, a.pidid, a.pidlabel, a.pidmode, a.pidaccess, type ,a.pidrequired FROM ( SELECT a.pipdid, a.pidid, b.pidlabel, b.pidmode, a.pidaccess, '0' as type, a.pidrequired FROM IG881 a INNER JOIN IG007 b ON (a.pidid = b.pidid) WHERE a.psdid = :psdid AND a.ppdid = :ppdid AND b.ppidid is null UNION ALL SELECT a.pidid, a.pidid, a.pidlabel, a.pidmode, '0' as pidaccess, '1' as type, pidrequired FROM IG007 a WHERE a.pdid = :pdid and a.ppidid is null AND NOT EXISTS(select 1 from IG881 b WHERE b.pidid = a.pidid AND b.ppdid = :ppdid AND b.psdid = :psdid) ) a INNER JOIN IG007 b on(a.pidid = b.pidid) ORDER BY pidsortid ASC, pidid ASC

SELECT pdvid, a.pidid, a.pidlabel, a.pidmode, a.pidaccess, type, a.pidrequired FROM ( SELECT a.pdvid, a.pidid, b.pidlabel, b.pidmode, a.pidaccess, '0' as type, a.pidrequired FROM IG699 a INNER JOIN IG007 b ON (a.pidid = b.pidid) WHERE a.psdid = :psdid AND (b.ppidid = '' or b.ppidid is null) UNION ALL SELECT a.pidid, a.pidid, a.pidlabel, a.pidmode, '1' as pidaccess, '1' as type, a.pidrequired FROM IG007 a WHERE a.pdid = :pdid AND (a.ppidid = '' or a.ppidid is null) AND NOT EXISTS(select 1 from IG699 b WHERE b.pidid = a.pidid AND b.psdid = :psdid) ) a INNER JOIN IG007 b on(a.pidid = b.pidid) ORDER BY pidsortid ASC, pidid ASC

select a.pdid,a.pdname,b.psprpid,'' dpsprpid from (SELECT substr(pdid,1,5) pdid,pdname FROM IG380 WHERE PDID IN ( SELECT MAX(PDID) FROM IG380 GROUP BY SUBSTR(PDID,1,5)) and ptid=8) a left outer join IG911 b on a.pdid = trim(b.RELEVANTPDID) and b.PDID=:pdid and b.PSDID=:psdid and b.ROLEID=:roleid ORDER BY a.PDID

select a.pdid,a.pdname,b.dpsprpid,'' psprpid from (SELECT substr(pdid,1,5) pdid,pdname FROM IG380 WHERE PDID IN ( SELECT MAX(PDID) FROM IG380 GROUP BY SUBSTR(PDID,1,5)) and ptid=8) a left outer join IG931 b on a.pdid = trim(b.RELEVANTPDID) and b.PDID=:pdid and b.PSDID=:psdid ORDER BY a.PDID

GROUP BY SUBSTR(PDID,1,5) )

SELECT r.* FROM ROLE r WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IG213 prtd WHERE prtd.roletype = r.roletype AND prtd.pdid = :pdid) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM IG298 psrd WHERE psrd.roleid = r.roleid AND psrd.psdid = :psdid) ORDER BY r.roletype, r.roleid

select pbd.pbdid,pbd.pbdname,pbd.pbdflag,ppbd.ppbdid,ppbd.ppdid,ppbd.ppbdname,ppbd.ppbddesc,ppbd.Ppbdauth,ppbd.checkrequired,ppbd.checkrecord,ppbd.acturl,ppbd.Fingerprint,''as pdbdid,'' as psdid,'' as pdbdname,'' as pdbddesc,'' as pdbdauth from IG900 pbd left join IG132 ppbd on ( pbd.pbdid = ppbd.pbdid AND ppbd.ppdid = :ppdid ) order by pbd.pbdid

select pbd.pbdid,pbd.pbdname,pbd.pbdflag,pdbd.Pdbdid,pdbd.Psdid,pdbd.Pdbdname,pdbd.Pdbddesc,pdbd.Pdbdauth,pdbd.checkrequired,pdbd.checkrecord,pdbd.acturl,pdbd.Fingerprint,'' as ppbdid,'' as ppdid,'' as ppbdname,'' as ppbddesc,'' as ppbdauth from IG900 pbd left join IG725 pdbd on ( pbd.pbdid = pdbd.pbdid AND pdbd.psdid = :psdid) order by pbd.pbdid

SELECT b.pbdid as vbid, b.ppbdname as vbname, b.ppbddesc as vbdesc, b.ppbdauth as vbauth, a.pbdimage as vbimage,b.checkrequired as vbrequired,b.acturl ,b.checkrecord as vbrecord,b.acturl as vbacturl FROM IG900 a INNER JOIN IG132 b on(a.pbdid = b.pbdid) INNER JOIN IG222 c on(b.ppdid = c.ppdid AND c.psdid = :psdid AND c.roleid = :roleid) ORDER BY b.pbdid

SELECT b.pbdid as vbid, b.pdbdname as vbname, b.pdbddesc as vbdesc, b.pdbdauth as vbauth, a.pbdimage as vbimage,b.checkrequired as vbrequired,b.acturl ,b.checkrecord as vbrecord,b.acturl as vbacturl FROM IG900 a INNER JOIN IG725 b on(a.pbdid = b.pbdid AND b.psdid = :psdid) ORDER BY b.pbdid
SELECT a.roleid||'' AS roleid, b.pbdid||'' AS pbdid FROM IG222 a INNER JOIN IG132 b on(a.ppdid = b.ppdid) WHERE a.psdid = :psdid AND b.ppbdauth = '1'

SELECT a.pbdid||'' AS pbdid FROM IG725 a WHERE a.psdid = :psdid AND a.pdbdauth = '1' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM IG222 b INNER JOIN IG132 c on(b.ppdid = c.ppdid) WHERE b.psdid = :psdid AND c.pbdid = a.pbdid)

SELECT a.psdid, a.psdname, a.psdconfirm, a.psdassign, a.sms, a.email ,a.psdcode FROM ( SELECT a.psdid, a.psdname,a.psdcode, '0' AS psdconfirm, a.psdassign, b.sms, b.email FROM IG333 a LEFT OUTER JOIN IG212 b ON(a.psdid = b.psdid AND b.psdconfirm = '0') WHERE a.pdid = :pdid AND a.psdcode != 'C' UNION ALL SELECT a.psdid, a.psdname || '（确认）' psdname,a.psdcode, a.psdconfirm, a.psdassign, b.sms, b.email FROM IG333 a LEFT OUTER JOIN IG212 b ON(a.psdid = b.psdid AND a.psdconfirm = b.psdconfirm) WHERE a.pdid = :pdid AND a.psdconfirm = '1' ) a ORDER BY a.psdcode desc,a.psdconfirm desc

select a.psdid, a.pdid, a.psdname, a.psddesc, a.psdcode, a.psdtype, a.psdmode, a.participantchange, a.formGlobalControl, a.psdflag, a.psdassign, a.psdorg, a.psdconfirm, a.assignpsdid, a.assignpbdid, b.assignflag, a.assignPageType, a.fingerprint, a.jsfunction, a.bysequence, a.ppsdid, a.psdxml, a.branchcond from ig333 a,ig233 b where b.psdid = a.psdid and b.assignpsdid = :assignpsdid and b.assignpbdid = :assignpbdid order by bysequence asc,psdid asc

select c.psdid, c.pidid, c.pivalue, c.psdconfirm, c.notifyd, c.notifyh, c.notifym, c.reportd, c.reporth, c.reportm, c.rolename, c.roleid, c.rolemanager, c.processbl, c.fingerprint from ( select a.psdid, a.pidid, case when b.pivalue = '' or b.pivalue is null then a.pidoption else b.pivalue end pivalue, case when b.psdconfirm = '' or b.psdconfirm is null then '0' else b.psdconfirm end psdconfirm, b.notifyd notifyd, b.notifyh notifyh, b.notifym notifym, b.reportd reportd, b.reporth reporth, b.reportm reportm, b.rolename rolename, b.roleid roleid, b.rolemanager rolemanager, b.processbl processbl, b.fingerprint fingerprint, a.pdid
from (select i1.pidid,i2.psdid, i1.pdid, i1.pidoption from ig007 i1, ig333 i2 where i1.pdid = i2.pdid) a left join ig335 b on (a.pidid = b.pidid and a.psdid = b.psdid) ) c where c.pdid = :pdid and c.psdid = :psdid and c.pidid = :pidid and c.psdconfirm = :psdconfirm
